Recipe.18630364-3afc-4c71-8458-5c790ae96.title: Coconut Curry Chicken
Recipe.18630364-3afc-4c71-8458-5c790ae96.ingredients:
1 pound boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces
1 tablespoon vegetable oil
1 onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tablespoon curry powder
1 teaspoon ground ginger
1 (13.5 oz) can coconut milk
1 cup chicken broth
1 tablespoon soy sauce
1 tablespoon brown sugar
1 red bell pepper, chopped (optional)
1 green bell pepper, chopped (optional)
1 cup broccoli florets (optional)
Chopped fresh cilantro (for garnish)
Cooked rice (for serving)
Recipe.18630364-3afc-4c71-8458-5c790ae96.introduction: A creamy and flavorful Thai-inspired dish.
Recipe.18630364-3afc-4c71-8458-5c790ae96.instructions:
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add the chicken and cook until browned on all sides.
Remove chicken from the pan and set aside.
Add the onion and garlic to the pan and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in the curry powder and ginger, and cook for another minute.
Pour in the coconut milk, chicken broth, soy sauce, and brown sugar.
Bring to a simmer.
Add the red bell pepper, green bell pepper, and broccoli (if using), and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until tender-crisp.
Return the chicken to the pan and heat through.
Garnish with chopped fresh cilantro and serve over cooked rice.
